files:
- ngl:
    filename: nGlide200_setup.exe
    url: http://www.zeus-software.com/downloads/nglide/d-1.html
- dxwnd: https://freefr.dl.sourceforge.net/project/dxwnd/Latest%20build/v2_05_16_build.rar
game:
  args: /r:0
  exe: drive_c/dxwnd/dxwnd.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- insert-disc:
    requires: voodoo/spvoodoo.exe
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/splanet/
    src: $DISC/splanet/
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/splanet/
    src: $DISC/voodoo/
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/splanetcd/splanet/
    src: $DISC/splanet/
- execute:
    command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/splanet/"; chmod -R u-x,g-x,o-x,u+X,u+w,g+r *;
- write_config:
    data:
      scorch:
        HighQualityVideo: 1
        settings: 1 0 1 1 5 95 127 0 0 5 320
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/splanet/splanet.ini
- task:
    args: /S
    description: NGlide installation
    executable: $ngl
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: Splash
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Zeus Software\nGlide2
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: '0'
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/dxwnd
    file: dxwnd
- write_config:
    data:
      target:
        cdvol0: 0
        codepage0: 0
        coord0: 3
        country0: 0
        dflag0: 0
        dflagb0: 0
        exepath: C:\splanet\
        expert: 1
        fakec0: None
        fakecd0: c:\splanetcd
        fakecddrive0: 'D:'
        fakecdlabel0: SPLANET
        faked0: None
        filterid0: 0
        flag0: 673185825
        flagg0: 1207959568
        flagh0: 22
        flagi0: 138444804
        flagj0: 4224
        flagk0: 65536
        flagl0: 1114112
        flagm0: 0
        flagn0: 17825796
        flago0: 64
        flagp0: 8192
        flagq0: 0
        icon0: 
        initresh0: 600
        initresw0: 800
        initts0: 0
        initx0: 0
        inity0: 0
        lang0: 0
        launchpath0: C:\splanet\spvoodoo.exe
        maxddinterface0: 7
        maxfps0: 0
        maxres0: -1
        maxx0: 0
        maxy0: 0
        minx0: 0
        miny0: 0
        module0: null
        monitorid0: -1
        notes0: null
        opengllib0: null
        path0: C:\splanet\spvoodoo.exe
        posx0: 50
        posy0: 50
        registry0: null
        renderer0: 3
        scanline0: 0
        sizx0: 800
        sizy0: 600
        slowratio0: 2
        startfolder0: C:\splanet
        swapeffect0: 0
        tflag0: 0
        title0: Scorched Pnet
        ver0: 0
        winver0: 0
      window:
        exepath: C:\splanet\
        expert: 1
        exportpath: C:\dxwnd\exports\
        posx: 786
        posy: 506
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/dxwnd/dxwnd.ini
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: csmt
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000000'
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
wine:
  Desktop: true
